description:
SATSANG IN BRUXELLES


Swami Premodaya will be in Bruxelles from Sep 6, 2012 – Sep 8, 2012

These deeply intimate meetings provide the rare opportunity to come together for inner exploration and going beyond the self. A brief meditation is followed by question and answer and self-discovery work. Satsang supports and promotes self-knowledge, transformation and true clarity. Seekers of all ages and stages come together as a community of support and sharing, forming a milieu conducive to truth and inner peace. Strangers quickly become friends in the loving atmosphere of Satsang, as we come to experience what lies ‘beyond the self’ in each one of us. Everyone is most welcome—the cost for the evening is by donation.  The room will be open 30 minutes prior to the event. Please arrive on time, so that others are not disturbed during the meditation or discussion time.

description:
SWAMI PREMODAYA INVITED TO REPRESENT SPIRITUALITY

AT RADICAL ART & POLITICS CULTURAL CONFERENCE

IN BELGIUM

BAINS CONNECTIVE presents 

  “COME TOGETHER”

 DIFFERENT APPROACHES OF BECOMING COMMUNITY

 

FRIDAY, 19 OCTOBER, 2012 at 20:00hrs.

Cost:  5 Euro

   

 

Conference Location:

A.Pass

P/A De Bottelarij

Delaunoystraat 58     1080 Molenbeek  (map) 

 

Swami Premodaya will hold “Satsang” (“loving gathering to invoke greater awareness of truth” –in essence, a spiritual ‘happening’).  This is an ancient Eastern format wherein a single meeting of one evening is used to come together as a temporary, open community of truth-seekers who support each other in sharing and exploring the Transcendental.  The officiation of the Spiritual Master creates a milieu conducive to authenticity and inner peace, so that the approach is experiential, rather than intellectual.  When truth is experienced, rather than debated, participants often feel a heightened sense of happiness, heart opening, and divine energy.  Swami Premodaya’s Satsangs can include:  Meditation; transmission of spiritual energy and higher awareness; discourse on the nature of the Profound and the Ultimate itself; instruction in self-discovery, inner exploration and going beyond the mind; direct work with participants wanting personal guidance; and question-&-answer.  Traditional Satsang is always spontaneous, unscripted and unrehearsed, and results from the Spiritual Master’s responses to, and interactions with, participants.  Each of the thousands of Satsangs Swami Premodaya has conducted has therefore been unique and unlike any other.

 

               “I highly recommend seeing this speaker at least once.”  ~ Ricardo Roman, Chiropractor

 

              “Outstanding experience!”  ~ Brad Berg, Pediatrician

   

 

 

www.Premodaya.com

description:
WINTER RESIDENTIAL RETREAT
4-Day Residential Retreat in Idyllwild, California with Bodhisattva Shree Swami Premodaya
24-28 January, 2013

DATES:
24-28 January, 2013
Check-in after 16:00 on Thursday, 24 January.
Check-out by 14:00 on Monday, 28 January.

LOCATION:
Creekstone Inn
54950 Pine Crest Avenue
Idyllwild, California 92549, USA

Located 20 minutes southwest of Palm Springs and 2 hours east of Los Angeles, the retreat site was personally chosen by Swami Premodaya as the ideal expression conducive to his transmission of sacred spiritual energy.

PROGRAM:
The preciousness of life, the reality of god, the truth of being, the infinite and eternal here/now, and the divine sacred nature of all that is—cannot be spoken, written, or even grasped by the human mind. It can only be revealed and personally experienced.

Instead of struggling with the ego and grappling with all your conditionings, strategies, and limited perceptions—Swami Premodaya invites you to step directly into the lucid awareness of the vast and unending divine reality— which is beyond all joys or sorrows, beyond any beliefs or ideas, beyond this body and its apparent life and death, and even beyond the most exquisite experiences or states of mind. When the sacred nature of life is contacted, only love and gratitude remain—flowering perennially within a life characterized by ever more surrender to truth and ever more palpable communion with the divine—and by selfishness transforming into selflessness.

FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:
Contact Premodaya.com, email: info (at) Premodaya.com
www.Premodaya.com

ACCOMMODATIONS:
Includes 4 days and 4 nights; double occupancy; rooms and roommates will be assigned based on Premodaya.com space management needs. Personal preferences will be taken into account, but cannot be guaranteed.

Creekstone Inn is a luxury mountain lodge located in the alpine resort village of Idyllwild. Nestled in the San Bernardino National Forest, of the San Jacinto mountains, the lodge is walking distance to the center of town, with its numerous shops and restaurants. It is equally central to the hiking trails, ski areas, and nature attractions that have made Idyllwild a favored destination for summer and winter vacationers alike.

We have reserved the entire lodge for our exclusive use, including all the well-appointed rooms with private bath, spacious fireside living room/lobby, gourmet industrial kitchen, sit-down dining room, covered patios and open decks, billiard room, and many other outstanding first class amenities to support maximum relaxation and enjoyment, as well as provide an inspiring and serene environment for the retreat.

FOOD:
Meals, including any type of food and/or beverages, are not included, and are the responsibility of the individual. The lodge has a gourmet kitchen with appliances, and is available for those who wish to bring their own groceries. Several markets and numerous restaurants and cafes are within easy walking distance.

WEATHER:
Winters in Idyllwild are cold, including snowfall and below-freezing temperatures. Remember, this village is a high altitude alpine area (think Swiss Alps). You will need adequate winter clothing, including any snow gear you feel you need.

REGISTRATION:
Pre-registration (including tuition payment) is required (cash, check or credit card). Registration is quick and easy by email (info [at] Premodaya.com) or call at 001-three-ten/four nine seven one eight nine nine. The retreat is limited to a maximum of 22 participants.

TUITION:

$1,095.00   1 November through 7 January
Retreatants who sign up later may be assigned to off-site sleeping quarters.

$1,195.00   8 January through 23 January

For those who prefer or request added privacy, individual private rooms are available at the off-site sleeping quarters location at a fixed rate of $1,395.00 through 7 January ($1,495.00 from 8 January through 23 January).

Tuition payment must be completed to guarantee your reservation.

CANCELLATION POLICY:
Cancellation fees:
1 November through 21 December — $450
After 21 December — Full tuition

“…good times…wonderful people." ~ JF (age 63)

“I have never felt so clear, so full of grace, so full of gratitude in my entire life." ~ LW (age 28)

description:
From this month's Video Satsang:

"...Joy is not a mood state, although there can be a mood state of joy. And joy is not an attitude, although there can be a joyful attitude. And joy is not an emotion, although there can be a joyful emotion. I am going to give you the deepest definition there is. Because what you’re used to hearing, what you’ve been told from numerous sources—you’ve heard it your whole life—is that God is love, the universe is love, life is about love. It’s not accurate. It’s correct; it’s close enough, but the more precise and accurate definition is: God is Joy. The universe is joy. Life is joy. When you hear 'God is love', what they are really trying to say is 'God is Joy'."

description:
From this month's Video Satsang:

“No one, in my world, in my way of looking at things—what I’ve come to in my understanding is— no one has the right to take life (and that includes their own life).

Life is over soon enough (snaps fingers)—like that! There’s no need to rush it, by taking your own life. I’m against all suicide for any reason— any reason. Life is over quick enough. That’s really my view. Life is over quick enough. It’s over pretty darn quick. You’ll be surprised.

I would say, about myself, that I probably did not truly enter spiritual life (I might have thought I did, I don’t really remember), but I would have to surmise, I would have to assume, that I hit a new level of spiritual life—after I took suicide off the table… There became a point where I became aware of the ultimate sanctity of life, the ultimate sacredness, and the fact that you do not (if you look at it my way), you do not have right to end any life. That includes the life of a mosquito”. </a>

description:
From this month's Video Satsang:

“You just have to clear out enough garbage for the truth to be obvious. That’s another way to characterize the spiritual path: It’s taking out the garbage. If it’s conditioning, it’s garbage—because it’s not natural to you, it’s not organic. It’s something that was thrown on you. The true spiritual process is natural and organic. It’s about becoming what’s left when all of the garbage has been removed, then what will be left is you. So how do you get to you, if there is a lot of garbage on top? You have to throw away the garbage first, to get to you. And you don’t have to keep carrying it the rest of your life. In fact, the spiritual imperative is that you don’t—because it cripples you. You can’t be you if you’re carrying around a sack of garbage.”

description:
SATSANG IN AMSTERDAM WITH SWAMI PREMODAYA

‘Satsang’ is an ancient Sanskrit term meaning “keeping company with Truth” or “meeting in Truth”. It refers to whenever sincere spiritual seekers gather in the company of a genuine spiritual master—which then creates an 'energy field'. The master’s divine energy flow makes Truth more palpable for those present, often with the result of experiencing heightened spiritual awareness, sudden clarity, deep states of bliss—even immediate, positive transformation.

The time-honored format starts with a brief silent meditation (during which the master transmits divine blessings to those present), followed by a discourse, and a question-&-answer period. You're warmly invited to bring your most significant spiritual questions, and please be ready for real answers. No religion or philosophy is involved--just personal discovery. And for those who want to dive deeper, Swami Premodaya will work directly with that individual’s soul energy, to clear blockages, or even shift to a higher consciousness.

Simonshavenstraat 86
1107 VC
Amsterdam

By donation

description:
WINTER RESIDENTIAL RETREAT
4-Day Residential Retreat in Idyllwild, California with Bodhisattva Shree Swami Premodaya January 23-27, 2014                      


DATES:
January 23-27, 2014
Check-in after 4:00pm on Thursday, January 23rd.
Check-out by 2:00pm on Monday, January 27th.

LOCATION:
Creekstone Inn
54950 Pine Crest Avenue
Idyllwild, CA 92549

Conveniently located 20 minutes southwest of Palm Springs and 2 hours east of Los Angeles, the retreat site was personally chosen by Swami Premodaya as the ideal expression conducive to his transmission of sacred spiritual energy.

PROGRAM:
The preciousness of life, the reality of god, the truth of being, the infinite and eternal here/now, and the divine sacred nature of all that is—cannot be spoken, written, or even grasped by the human mind. It can only be revealed and personally experienced.

Instead of struggling with the ego and grappling with all your conditionings, strategies, and limited perceptions—Swami Premodaya invites you to step directly into the lucid awareness of the vast and unending divine reality— which is beyond all joys or sorrows, beyond any beliefs or ideas, beyond this body and its apparent life and death, and even beyond the most exquisite experiences or states of mind. When the sacred nature of life is contacted, only love and gratitude remain—flowering perennially within a life characterized by ever more surrender to truth and ever more palpable communion with the divine—and by selfishness transforming into selflessness.

FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

www.Premodaya.com

ACCOMMODATIONS:
Includes 4 days and 4 nights; double occupancy; rooms and roommates will be assigned based on Premodaya.com’s space management needs. Personal preferences will be taken into account, but cannot be guaranteed.

Creekstone Inn is a luxury mountain lodge located in the alpine resort village of Idyllwild. Nestled in the San Bernardino National Forest, of the San Jacinto mountains, the lodge is walking distance to the center of town, with its numerous shops and restaurants. It is equally central to the hiking trails, ski areas, and nature attractions that have made Idyllwild a favored destination for summer and winter vacationers alike.

Premodaya.com has reserved the entire lodge for our exclusive use, including all the well-appointed rooms with private bath, spacious fireside livingroom/lobby, gourmet industrial kitchen, sit-down dining room, covered patios and open decks, billiard room, and many other outstanding first class amenities to support maximum relaxation and enjoyment, as well as provide an inspiring and serene environment for the retreat.

FOOD:
Meals, including any type of food and/or beverages, are not included, and are the responsibility of the individual. The lodge has a gourmet kitchen with appliances, and is available for those who wish to bring their own groceries. Numerous restaurants and cafes are within easy walking distance.

DRIVING DIRECTIONS:
Driving directions are available at <a>www.creekstoneinn.com.</a>

WEATHER:
Winters in Idyllwild are cold, including snowfall and below-freezing temperatures. Remember, this village is a high altitude alpine area (think Swiss Alps). You will need adequate winter clothing, including any snow gear you feel you need.

REGISTRATION:
The retreat is limited to a maximum of 22 participants. Pre-registration (including tuition payment) is required (cash, check or credit card). Registration is quick and easy by phone:

TUITION:

$995.00 prior to November 1 (SPECIAL: Last year's price) Guarantees you a spot in the main lodge [double occupancy]

$1,095.00 November 1 through January 7
Retreatants who sign up later may be assigned to off-site sleeping quarters.

$1,195.00 January 8 through January 22

For those who prefer or request added privacy, individual private rooms are available at the off-site sleeping quarters location at a fixed rate of $1,395.00 through January 7 ($1,495.00 January 8 through January 22).

Tuition payment must be completed to guarantee your reservation.

CANCELLATION POLICY:
Cancellation fees:
Through October 31 — $150
November 1 through December 21 — $450
After December 21 — Full tuition

description:
FREE ONLINE SATSANG

Beloved Friends,

There will be a special Online Satsang (free) this Sunday.  Everyone is invited!

SUNDAY, MARCH 9, 2014

 at 9:00pm (CET).

This online meeting will begin promptly, so please link up no later than ten minutes before, as it takes a few minutes to log in.  If it is your first Online Satsang, we recommend even earlier, to download and familiarize yourself with the software.  A picture tutorial is available at https://www.fuzebox.com/support/fuze-ed/quick-start-guides.  Sky, who is moderating the meeting, will start it ½ hour before, and be available for you to practice.

The ONLINE SATSANG is a live, real-time, interactive online meeting:  Your active participation is appreciated, and we invite your questions, reports and comments. 

You can join by computer, telephone or mobile device. 


If by computer or mobile device,

 1. Go to:

http://fuze.me/23619811

2. Enter your name.
3. Be sure the “Launch Fuze meeting in the browser” box is unchecked.  (on mobile devices a meeting number may be requested, if so, enter[masked])

4. Click "Join as attendee".

5. Select your audio conference preference (VoIP is recommended, if you’re using a computer).

6. Click the “Join video conference” button (Note:  your camera may be “paused”  — be sure to unpause it). To view the video full screen, click on the “expand” button (located near the video screen).

7. You will be muted initially; to speak with Swami Premodaya, raise your flag by clicking on the flag icon, or write to the meeting moderator, by typing in the “Meeting chat” box.

On the technical side, we need your cooperation in the following ways, for a smoother meeting:  1.  Wear headphones (helps prevent audible echo and feedback). 2.  Connect via an Ethernet line, as Wifi can be inconsistent and streaming video is bandwidth heavy.  3.  Turn off all other programs and applications, so only Fuze is running on your computer. 4.  If you are having difficulties, often powering down your computer and re-starting after 2 minutes helps.

description:
DATES:

Check-in: After 4pm ~ Friday, 23 May, 2014

Check-out: By 5pm ~ Monday, 26 May, 2014

LOCATION:

PROGRAM

A full 3-day intensive program (3 nights/3 days) of spiritual exploration with Bodhisattva Shree Swami Premodaya.  Premodaya.com’s residential retreats have proven to be powerful vehicles for generating accelerated personal growth and permanent transformation. This human life is (nothing less than) a profound cosmic adventure. Premodaya’s mission is to guide seekers toward awareness of these invisible, intangible, experiential, and deeply fulfilling levels of this shared galactic journey (that we’re inaccurately taught to personalize as “my life”).

Premodaya’s Master, Gangaji, has said: ”The deeper investigation demanded by a spiritual life, revealed the limits of my idea of freedom. I came to recognize that the desire ‘to do whatever I want to do’ is an infantile, or at best, an adolescent view of freedom. To be free to do what I want to do, is not reliable freedom at all. What one simply wants to do, is dictated by impulses, instincts, desires, and other people’s opinions. It’s dictated by memories and by thoughts about what may come next. This is the opposite of freedom!”

And Premodaya explains: “True happiness is spiritual happiness. It’s the contentedness that arises when you’re not being ruled by ‘impulses, instincts, desires and opinions’ (worldliness)—not captive to ‘memories and thoughts’ (personality). When instead, you’re identified with the Divine. Truth becomes actually available, only when you’re no longer a slave to yourself.  Truth, freedom, inner peace, God-centeredness—these are potentials. They result from going beyond your limited personal psychology—from moving toward the Universal, the Timeless, the Infinite/Eternal.  Ultimately, this is achieved through surrender (as reached through love, devotion or trust [‘bhakti’] or through higher knowing [‘jnani’]), which simply amounts to overcoming restrictive individual will. Overcome your willfulness, and you’ll become truly happy, truly free, truly a willing participant in life.

ACCOMMODATIONS/AMENITIES/LOCALE

3 days/3 nights, triple or quadruple occupancy. Room assignments are based on available space, and Premodaya.com is pleased to take personal preferences into account, but cannot guarantee that all requests will be met.

The beautiful ranch property is situated at an altitude of 3,700 feet, in the high desert foothills of the San Bernardino Mountains of California. Premodaya.com has reserved the entire sprawling ranch property for our exclusive use. Among the many amenities are numerous groves, gardens and hiking trails, and designated lush meditation spots.

MEALS / FOOD / BEVERAGES

Healthy and delicious meals, snacks and beverages are all included in the cost of the tuition. The ranch kitchen offers a variety of both vegetarian and non- vegetarian selections, with emphasis on fresh ingredients and pleasing the palate. Please let us know of any personal diet restrictions or needs when you register, as we are pleased to accommodate you in any way possible.

DRIVING DIRECTIONS & AIRPORT FACILITIES

Detailed driving directions will be provided in your retreat registration packet. For registrants flying in, airport and transportation information will be provided.

REGISTRATION

Pre-registration and tuition payment are required prior to admittance.

Payment plans and limited scholarships are available to qualified applicants (all scholarships are partial scholarships; you must pay something). If limited income or resources genuinely preclude your being able to attend, we invite you to ask for a payment plan or partial scholarship application. Payment plan arrangements and scholarship applications must be completed and/or submitted prior to April 1, 2014, for this event.

TUITION

(All-inclusive: Full retreat program, lodging, meals, snacks and beverages)

Earlybird registration (through April 5): $995 USD

Registration (April 6through May 22): $1095 USD

Day of (space permitting): $1195 USD

...for a private room/private bath add:

Earlybird registration (through April 5): $500 USD

Registration (April 6 through May 22): $550 USD

Day of (space permitting): $600 USD

CANCELLATION/REFUND POLICY

If you need to cancel for any reason, your tuition paid may be applied, in full, to any future Premodaya.com retreat, event or fee-based service of your choice (sorry—not transferable; no monetary refunds).

description:
Free Special Event - Special Memorial Tribute Satsang:  "The Joy-Spreading Man"

On February 8, 2014, Swami Premodaya appeared on Allan Silberhartz’s long-running and popular international cable TV spirituality interview show: “Bridging Heaven & Earth”. Two months later, Mr. Silberhartz (“silver heart”) suddenly and unexpectedly passed away. This Premodaya.com event is a tribute to Allan—one of those rare (and truly magical) human beings who (without necessarily trying or intending it) somehow manage, wherever they happen to be, to spread love and joy to all present, at all times. The event will include the world premier (first ever public screening & broadcast) of that very special interview. It will also include Premodaya’s amazing, detailed explanation of what it means to be “a joy-spreading person”—why and how they got that way—how to know when you’re in the presence of a joy-spreader (it’s not as easy and obvious as you might think)—and the secrets of how you can garner great benefits for yourself, whenever you’re with, or near, such a one.

“I was near, or with, Allan for about 5 hours total (having never met him before or since). I know hardly anything about him. But before arriving at his studio, I’d been shown a video of one of his interviews. Seeing instantly that he was what I’ve long referred to as a “joy-spreader” or “love-spreader”, I told the people with me they’d be very happy they’d decided to attend this taping, because besides driving to an interview—more significantly—they were en route to “a genuine love-fest”. I spent only a few hours in his company, but as happens with all authentic love-spreaders, I am immensely enriched and improved by him. I deeply feel his loss and I will fondly and gratefully remember him the remainder of my days. True joy-spreaders are quite rare. It’s common to go an entire lifetime and never meet even a single one; if you meet 3, you’re one of only a handful of people throughout human history. Consider that when one love-spreader dies, the loss of that one is equal to the loss of 1,000 of the rest of us!—so valuable and precious are these unconditional redeemers of the (divinely-gifted) human heart”. ~ Swami Premodaya


Where: available streaming online: http://fuze.me/24472999

Everyone Welcome

 

www.premodaya.com

                                                    LOG-ON INSTRUCTIONS:

The ONLINE SATSANG is a live, real-time, interactive online meeting:  Your active participation is appreciated, and we invite your questions, reports and comments. 

You can join by computer, telephone or mobile device.  If by computer or mobile device,

 1. Go to:

http://fuze.me/25370867

2. Enter your name.
3. Be sure the “Launch Fuze meeting in the browser” box is unchecked.  (on mobile devices a meeting number may be requested, if so, enter[masked])

4. Click "Join as attendee".
5. Select your audio conference preference (VoIP is recommended, if you’re using a computer).

6. Click the “Join video conference” button (Note:  your camera may be “paused”  — be sure to unpause it). To view the video full screen, click on the “expand” button (located near the video screen).

7. You will be muted initially; to speak with Swami Premodaya, raise your flag by clicking on the flag icon, or write to the meeting moderator, by typing in the “Meeting chat” box.

If joining on your telephone,

1. Dial (201)[masked]

2. Enter meeting number:  [masked] then press “#”. 

3. Please ‘mute’ your phone, and when you wish to speak, unmute yourself (if you don’t mute your phone, the moderator will have to mute your line, and won’t know when you wish to speak).

4. When speaking, please don’t use the speakerphone function.

On the technical side, we need your cooperation in the following ways, for a smoother meeting: 

1.  Wear headphones (helps prevent audible echo and feedback).

2.  Connect via an Ethernet line, as Wifi can be inconsistent and streaming video is bandwidth heavy. 

3.  Turn off all other programs and applications, so only Fuze is running on your computer.

4.  If you are having difficulties, often powering down your computer and re-starting after 2 minutes helps.

Thank you for participating in ONLINE SATSANG.

name: SATSANG AT I-CODA (LIVE ONLINE)

description:
WINTER RESIDENTIAL RETREAT
               4-Day Residential Retreat in Idyllwild California  with Bodhisattva Shree Swami Premodaya
                              December 12-15, 2014

WINTER RESIDENTIAL RETREAT
4-Day Residential Retreat in Idyllwild, California with Bodhisattva Shree Swami Premodaya
December 11-15, 2014

ONLINE ACCOMMODATIONS:
For disciples, friends and spiritual seekers unable to join us in Southern California, the entire retreat can be experienced online—live, in real time, and fully interactive—be there with us!  And if you’ll be joining us online, we encourage you to give yourself the gift of a full retreat experience:  Outside of scheduled program hours, give yourself the gift of really being in retreat from your routine activities, and allow this event to provide relaxation, refuge and regeneration, along with powerful spiritual benefit.

DATES:
December 12-15, 2014
Check-in after 4:00pm on Friday, December 12th.
Check-out by 11:00pm on Monday, December 15th.

LOCATION:
Creekstone Inn
54950 Pine Crest Avenue
Idyllwild, CA 92549

Conveniently located 20 minutes southwest of Palm Springs and 2 hours east of Los Angeles, the retreat site was personally chosen by Swami Premodaya as the ideal expression conducive to his transmission of sacred spiritual energy.

PROGRAM:

The spiritual path is not the accumulation of anything, it’s the letting go of everything... You become willing to let go of what’s not true, what’s not real and what’s not you. And it turns out that most of what we’re carrying is that: The untrue, the unreal—and the ‘not us’. Because we’ve been trained, we’ve been programmed, we’ve been habituated, we’ve been filled from birth (and even before birth!) with all kinds of programs and ideas and learnings—and we think this is us. We experience ourselves as our preferences, but these preferences are pre-programmed; they’re not yours, they’re not you. But they’re so deep, they’re so ingrained, they’re so taught from the very beginning—in so many ways—verbal and non-verbal and every other—culturally instilled, familially instilled—that we don’t recognize it. It feels to us, like ‘us’. It feels like, “That’s who I am”. But it’s not. It doesn’t take a lot of thinking for intelligent people to quickly get it, that that can’t be who you really are. There has to be something that’s before that, that’s more the essential you.

And it’s everybody’s dilemma. But only a rare few are willing to...say: “Okay, I don’t want to settle for the false, I don’t want to settle for what’s not real. I don’t care what you call it—Truth, God, Self-Realization—whatever it is, I want what’s real; I don’t want the fake life.” Very few people in every generation come to that point. So if that has any meaning for you...you are the select few. It doesn’t make you special in the sense that you are better than someone. But it does make you very special, in the sense that you’re a tiny minority on the entire planet who have come to a point of maturity, of spiritual awareness, that you’re able to recognize what matters. You may not have every answer, you may not be clear about it—it doesn’t matter—you’re on the tip of unspeakable possibilities. This is your great good fortune. This is Grace itself.  So be glad!  You have much reason to be glad, whether you’re aware of it or not. I’m just trying to get you to be more aware of it.

~ from Darshan with Bodhisattva Shree Swami Premodaya – September 20, 2007 – Los Angeles

FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

www.Premodaya.com

ACCOMMODATIONS:
Includes 4 days and 4 nights; double occupancy; rooms and roommates will be assigned based on Premodaya.com’s space management needs. Personal preferences will be taken into account, but cannot be guaranteed.

Creekstone Inn is a luxury mountain lodge located in the alpine resort village of Idyllwild. Nestled in the San Bernardino National Forest, of the San Jacinto mountains, the lodge is walking distance to the center of town, with its numerous shops and restaurants. It is equally central to the hiking trails, ski areas, and nature attractions that have made Idyllwild a favored destination for summer and winter vacationers alike.

Premodaya.com has reserved the entire lodge for our exclusive use, including all the well-appointed rooms with private bath, spacious fireside livingroom/lobby, gourmet industrial kitchen, sit-down dining room, covered patios and open decks, billiard room, and many other outstanding first class amenities to support maximum relaxation and enjoyment, as well as provide an inspiring and serene environment for the retreat.

FOOD:
Meals, including any type of food and/or beverages, are not included, and are the responsibility of the individual. The lodge has a gourmet kitchen with appliances, and is available for those who wish to bring their own groceries. Numerous restaurants and cafes are within easy walking distance.

DRIVING DIRECTIONS:
Driving directions are available at www.creekstoneinn.com.

WEATHER:
Winters in Idyllwild are cold, including snowfall and below-freezing temperatures. Remember, this village is a high altitude alpine area (think Swiss Alps). You will need adequate winter clothing, including any snow gear you feel you need.

REGISTRATION:
The retreat is limited to a maximum of 22 participants.  Pre-registration (including tuition payment) is required (cash, check or credit card).  Registration is quick and easy by phone: 

TUITION:

$995.00 prior to October 1 (SPECIAL: Last year's price) Guarantees you a spot in the main lodge [double occupancy]

$1,095.00 October 1 through November 30
Retreatants who sign up later may be assigned to off-site sleeping quarters.

$1,195.00 December 1 through December 10

For those who prefer or request added privacy, individual private rooms are available at the off-site sleeping quarters location at a fixed rate of $1,495.00 through November 30 ($1,595.00 December 1 through December 10).

Tuition payment must be completed to guarantee your reservation.

CANCELLATION POLICY:
Cancellation fees:
Through September 30 — $150
October 1 through November 15 — $450 
After November 15 — Full tuition

description:
ONLINE SATSANG

                            LIVE INTERACTIVE MEETING 
        WITH BODHISATTVA SHREE SWAMI PREMODAYA

                 Every Saturday (except Workshop days) 
                                     8:00pm to 9:15pm 
                                           (UTC+1:00)

These meetings provide the special opportunity to participate in interactive Online Satsang with Swami Premodaya. Swami Premodaya will join us via live videoconferencing, as we come together as a community of support and sharing, forming a milieu conducive to truth and inner peace. Via real-time interactive video we can see and talk with Swami Premodaya directly. The community of Satsang supports and promotes inner exploration, self-knowledge, transformation and true clarity.

For those not in Southern California, we use real-time streaming video so that you can see and talk with Swami Premodaya directly.

To join our weekly Satsang on your computer or mobile device, simply click on the link below (if it’s your first time, please email [masked]for instructions)

http://fuze.me/25965646


To join via phone, dial +1 (201)[masked] 
And enter meeting number  [masked]

~ Swami Premodaya

www.Premodaya.com
